biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Michael Patrick Jann (born May 15, 1970 in Albany, New York, USA) is an American actor, writer and director, best known as a cast member of MTV's The State and director of the film Drop Dead Gorgeous.

He directed many episodes of Reno 911! on Comedy Central, as well as most of the non-studio sketches on Little Britain USA.
name: Michael Patrick Jann
